outputs.output_descr: This project has as its main objective fostering the development capacities of CAIXA (Federal Economic Bank) team in the areas of internationalization of its activities, as well as in bank initiatives related to local development and microcredit. With the performance of the Project, the areas involved will be able to strengthen its capabilities in the formulation, articulation, implementation, monitoring, evaluation and control of the programs and actions of the company, as well as the promotion of local human development areas that will contribute to the development of vulnerable communities in Brazil.

project_descr: BRA/09/004 - Fortalecimento das capacidades da CAIXA para seu processo de internacionalização e de fomento a ações voltadas ao desenvolvimento humano local
